channel.title: Clue Scroll Help [317]
channel.description:
Hi i Got a Question About Clue Scrolls. is it possible To make clue Scrolls Gives items Like Dclaw,Whip,DFS Ect
But in Random Not Just like that Cause ill be adding Like noobish Stuff and rare stuff to it so they will have a 40% chance of haveing a good item Anyone can gimmi code to add cause this is the code that gives me Randomish Stuff Noobish
The c.addItem(Item.randomClue(), 1); is giveing me Like Random noobish Stuff Any help? How to change that one to another code that gives me Random Dclaw,Whip,Dfs,Runes,Bones Ect? Not just when u click and u get the items Cause then people will be Rich and have like 100 dclaws. [code=actionscript-french]case 2830: c.deleteItem(2830, c.getItemSlot(2830), 1); c.addItem(Item.randomClue(), 1); break;[/code]

item.title: Clue Scroll Help [317]
item.dc:creator: @p00n_scape p00n scape
item.description:
@p00n_scape wrote:

No cause if i do that, Then every Clue u Open u get the same Item and i dont want that…

Read full topic

item.title: Clue Scroll Help [317]
item.dc:creator: @wilsonman60 wilsonman60
item.description:
@wilsonman60 wrote:

[quote=“p00n scape, post:1, topic:304562”]Hi i Got a Question About Clue Scrolls. is it possible To make clue Scrolls Gives items Like Dclaw,Whip,DFS Ect

But in Random Not Just like that Cause ill be adding Like noobish Stuff and rare stuff to it so they will have a 40% chance of haveing a good item Anyone can gimmi code to add cause this is the code that gives me Randomish Stuff Noobish

The c.addItem(Item.randomClue(), 1); is giveing me Like Random noobish Stuff Any help? How to change that one to another code that gives me Random Dclaw,Whip,Dfs,Runes,Bones Ect? Not just when u click and u get the items Cause then people will be Rich and have like 100 dclaws.

case 2830: c.deleteItem(2830, c.getItemSlot(2830), 1); c.addItem(Item.randomClue(), 1); break;[/quote]Use the item id of the item and replace it with additem(####)

Read full topic
